PlotKeywords: A very cool companion to the hit, notorious film, Blair Witch Project. It's amazing this title got out as quickly as it did, since the movie was a surprise hit. Someone risked it all. It's ...

In a case that had the nation riveted and human rights organizations the world over up in arms due to the death sentence handed out to the accused, comes a tale about the lure of riches, power, eternal youth, beauty and the blood ...
After the avian flu epidemic, even old friends are unwelcome.
THE OMEN meets THE EXORCISM OF EMILY ROSE.

A nerve shattering psychological thriller. Following the story of a mild mannered Chemist, who soon realises that no one is quite who they seem, and that horrifying forces are closing in on the Chemist himself.
Two sisters and their boyfriends drive to a small cabin to spend the weekend with the girls parents. However, when they arrive, they find them missing and the cabin in disarray. Things ...
After a botched train robbery, Clyde, the leader of the group decides that his men should hide out in an abandoned town they come across. While hiding out in the town, strange events start ...

Walker Kennedy and his wife Col are a happy, voluntarily childless suburban couple. Then the thing they fear the most happens: part of their green surrounding is turned into a building site, for what turns out to be the widely acc...
There exists a religious brotherhood dedicated to battling the forces of evil. Claude wants nothing more than to join this order.
A hair-raising tale about a boy and girl when their car breaks down in the middle of a dark night and on lonesome road. The boy goes for help nearby while the girl waits in the car for him to return.
A young derelict is terrorized by an ominous phantom, with an ominous warning from beyond - what evil lurks beyond the door?

Vicki tries to clear a client of charges he murdered his wife, but with the jousting between Henry and Mike, and a disturbing dream, it looks like the case may be a little more complicated than she thought.
When Laura refuses to put out the fire in her fireplace, Dr. Guthrie makes a discovery.
1795 Time period. Angelique chokes Barnabas while he kisses Josette by tying a scarf around one of his toy soldiers.

1795 time period. Victoria panics when she sees Matthew Morgan lookalike Ben Stokes. Joshua threatens Ben and then tells Victoria that Millicent will marry Jeremiah. Angelique makes Ben help her in her plans for Josette.
1795 time period. Angelique tells Ben that she is his master now Millicent arrives. Jeremiah is unimpressed with Joshua's plans.
1795 time period. Angelique starts her spell to make Jeremiah love Josette. Josette and Barnabas open a package and find a skull.
Jeremiah regrets coming on to Josette but Angelique tells him that Josette acted that way at home. Barnabas teaches Ben the alphabet. Jeremiah tries to stop Barnabas from marrying Josette.

Natalie tells Andre that they in the presence of a force for evil. Andre confronts Jeremiah over his meeting Josette.Natalie's tarot cards revel to Naomi death and betrayal. Naomi sees Jeremiah and a woman in a dream.
Naomi sees the mark of the devil on Jeremiah and Josette. Angelique realizes that no-one can stop what she set in motion. Nathan chats up Millicent.
1795 time period. Angelique calls for Ben who hears that Jeremiah is leaving. Angelique searches for a way to prevent this.
1795 time period. Natalie and Victoria discuss the sudden disappearance of Joshua and the sudden appearance of a strange cat. Nathan warns Victoria that Natalie suspects witchcraft.

1795 time period. Natalie convinces Barnabas and Josette to marry immediately but Angelique casts a spell on Josette while helping her with her wedding dress. Ben tries to kill the cat but Angelique stops him.

1795 time period. Barnabas searches for Josette while Angelique schemes for his love. She refuses to use a love spell on him but she does send him a stranger in a vision. Barnabas finds Josette's veil.
1795 time period. Natalie questions Victoria and Abigall and Naomi argue. Joshua appears in front of Abigail in Victoria's room.
1795 time period. Josette wakes up in Jeremiah's arms but later she regrets marrying Jeremiah. Joshua tells Andre and Barnabas that Abigail has engaged the Rev. Trask to hunt for the witch.
1795 time period.Barnabas challenges Jeremiah to a duel which Josette and Angelique cannot prevent.
1795 time period. While Jeremiah lays dying witchhunter Reverand Trask enters Collinwood. He ties Victoria to a tree and tries to exorcise her.
Taped 12-12-1967. 1795 time period. Natalie consults her Tarot cards to learn where Victoria is. She...
1795 time period. Trask questions the residents of Collinwood. Angelique tells him where Victoria is hiding.
1785 time period. Angelique talks to Barnabas. She tells him that he is a poor judge of women. She gets him to say that he hates Josette. Angelique swears her love to him but Barnabas rejects her.
1795 time period. Sarah falls ill after Angelique sticks a few pins in one of her dolls. Barnabas agrees to marry Angelique if she cures Sarah.
1795 time period. Josette fears that Jeremiah will die. Andre jolts Barnabas by asking him to tell Josette that she is not to blame. Angelique insists that Barnabas keep his promise to marry her.
1795 time period. Joshua tells Naomi that he will tell people that Jeremiah died in a hunting accident. The family prepares to move into their new home.
1795 time period. Josette is threatened by the ghost of Jeremiah and is later shocked by the news that Barnabas will marry Angelique. Most of the family tries to prevent their marriage.
1795 time period. The family moves into the new Collinwood. The Ghost of Jeremiah ravages a room and attacks Barnabas.
1795 time period. Barnabas tells Joshua that he will marry Angelique that night. Joshua casts him from the family. Naomi gives him the Old House.
1795 time period. The ghost of Jeremiah laughs at Angelique. Ben tells Barnabas that Trask almost caught Victoria. Angelique is attacked by the ghost.
1795 time period. While Barnabas and the Reverend Bland wait for Angelique Ben rescues her from Jeremiah's grave.
1795 Time period. Angelique chats with Victoria than plots to betray her. Ben get caught in Abigail's room.
1795 Time period. Angelique prevents Ben from telling Abigail who the witch is. Sarah visits Victoria.
Time period 1795. Angelique casts a spell that drives Victoria out of the Old House into the waiting arms of Reverend Trask. Barnabas finally gets a clue that there is something odd about Angelique.
1795 Time period. Barnabas talks to Victoria and Ben and learns who the witch is. Victoria is held over for trial.

After Matthew Dragna inherits a rundown old casino from his deceased uncle, Matthew, his loyal girlfriend JJ, and several other friends decide to check the place out. Alas, the casino turns out to be haunted by the lethal and angr...
A young nursing student living away from home for the first time takes a break from her studies and goes home to visit mum, dad and brother. From the moment she gets home, however, nothing ...
A day in the life of Luke, a nurse with a powerful addiction.

Vicki Nelson, an ex-police detective with Retinitis Pigmentosa, gets caught up in an investigation after she witnesses a murder and the victim's girlfriend asks her to prove it was committed by a vampire.
1795 time period. Angelique's spell prevents Ben from saying her name but he writes the letter A. Barnabas twice tries to kill his wife. The portrait of Josette arrives provoking an argument.
1795 time period. Barnabas persuades Millicent to help him see Josette. Judge Matigan wants to help Victoria. Barnabas warns Josette and persuades her to leave Collinwood.

PlotKeywords: Hugo Stiglitz is a treasure hunter who leads an expedition that includes Roberto Ballesteros, an important scientist, and Edna Bolkan, a beautiful anthropologist, into the jungle. The group arrives at an ancient tomb and after ope...
A BEAUTIFUL MAIDEN IS CURSED WITH A DISFIGURED BUT FEROCIOUS HAND. MORE CURSED, HOWEVER, IS ANYONE WHO INCURES HER IRE.

Winnie Leung is a lonely woman that likes to make puppets and write her diary, and she misses her boy-friend Seth Lau, who left her after breaking up their relationship. Winnie leaves messages in his mail box and unsuccessfully tr...
When Vicki goes looking for a dead-beat dad, she finds a little more supernatural, and many more memories, than she wants.
1795 time period. Barnabas persuades Josette to leave. He gives her the music box. Later Angelique threatens Barnabas. He shoots her and she curses him.
1795 time period. At the Three Bells Inn Josette and Natalie realize that something is wrong with Barnabas. The attack of the Bat leaves Barnabas near death. Josette has the same marks on her neck.
1795 time period. Naomi comes to the Old House to find Angelique wiping up a blood stain on the floor. Josette and Natalie return to find Barnabas dying.

1795 time period. Barnabas collapses in Josette's arms. Angelique blames the plague. Josette visits Victoria who urges her to leave Collinwood. Josette reads of her own death in the Collins Family History.
1795 time period. Joshua tells Barnabas how sorry he is for what happened. Barnabas tells Josette he will return as he dies. Joshua plans to lie about the cause of Barnabas' death.

1795 time period. Joshua tells Angelique that he plans to tell everyone that Barnabas left for England. He tries to bribe her to cooperate. Angelique tells Ben to prepare a sharp wooden stake from a holly tree.
1795 time period. Angelique goes to the mausoleum to drive the stake through his heart so he won't return as a vampire.
1795 time period. Josette questions Victoria at the Gaol Peter allows Victoria to escape to get the Family History Book since it is evidence against her.
1795 time period. Naomi visits Victoria who warns Naomi about Sarah. Sarah goes outside and follows Barnabas.
1795 time period. Nathan and Millicent are interrupted by Naomi looking for Sarah. Barnabas attacks Ruby Tate. Sarah sees him covered with blood.
1795 time period. Sarah runs out in shock into a storm and becomes very ill.
Guilt-ridden over Sarah's death, Barnabas tries to persuade Ben to drive a stake through his heart.
1795 time period. Angelique's ghost taunts Ben, telling him that the curse she placed on Barnabas must continue for eternity.
Over a century ago Pirate's Point was overrun by pirates, led by Abraham LeVoy, who became known as Pirate Death. He looted from the town, slaughtering over 150 men, women and children and ...

Sweet Home Alabama, 1986: Burton has had a bad day, and things are about to get a hell of a lot worse. After loosing his job and finding his wife cheating on him with his best friend, Burton begins spending his days and nights at ...
When Walt's life starts to fall apart, he soon discovers that he's literally falling apart.
Five Kids Camping in the Northern Rocky Mountains have an encounter with a Mythological Creature.
Based on an urban legend, a woman waiting at a train stop on a late December night encounters 3 strange men.

A story about a bunch of young adults who take their plastic pony obsessions way too far and end up killing people, eating their flesh, and raising the dead. All while prancing around in unicorn outfits and stuff like that.

primaryTitle: Primal Screams: An Interview with Tobe Hooper
Working with a Master: Tobe Hooper

PlotKeywords: Barnabas reluctantly informs Josette they must stay apart forever. Suki Forbes arrives in Collinsport.
Suki is introduced as Nathan's sister, even though she is his wife. Barnabas and Josette meet for a final embrace.
Noticing Josette's strange behavior, Natalie pleads with Victoria to break the apparent spell on Josette.
Joshua goes to the tomb where he buried Barnabas and discovers that his coffin is now empty.
Suki discovers what Barnabas is and divulges his secret to Nathan before she dies.
1795 time period. Joshua and Naomi fear Josette will die the next day as recorded in the Collins family history book.
1795 time period. Josette is beckoned by Angelique to Widows' Hill, where she sees a terrifying vision of herself.
Millicent sees Barnabas in the graveyard. She informs Joshua that Barnabas ran away from her.
Reverend Trask calls upon Abigail to testify against Victoria as her witchcraft trial begins at the courthouse.
Joshua goes to the mausoleum and finds that the coffin now contains the body of Barnabas.
Peter realizes he must hide the Collins family history book, fearing it will be used against Victoria at her trial.
Using his occult powers, Barnabas raises Josette from the dead but he is horrified at her disfigured face.
Abigail investigates the Old House, unaware that Barnabas has moved his coffin into the basement.
Disturbed by Trask's interrogation of him, Daniel runs outside and discovers the dead body of Abigail.
Hoping to save Victoria from a guilty verdict, Peter tries to persuade Nathan to testify on her behalf.
After Nathan commits perjury for him on the witness stand, Trask convinces Joshua to forgive Nathan.
1795 time period. At the trial, Ben reveals that Angelique is a witch, but she soon materializes and condemns Victoria.
As a final effort to save her, Peter urges Victoria to tell the truth about herself, despite the risk.
1795 time period. Victoria testifies in court. A guilty verdict is announced and she is sentenced to be hanged as a witch.
1795 time period. Barnabas learns of Victoria's predicament and vows to avenge the unjust decision against her.
While attacking Maude Browning, a waterfront streetwalker, Barnabas accidentally drops his cane.
After Barnabas kills Maude, Trask is shocked to find her dead body lying in his bed.
Nathan discovers Maude's body and promises to help Trask dispose of it in return for Trask's help.
Barnabas lures Trask to the basement of the Old House and seals him up behind a brick wall.
Nathan pretends to rescue Millicent, who believes it was Barnabas who attacked her.
At Nathan's urging, Joshua goes to the Old House and is devastated to witness Barnabas rising from his coffin.
1795 time period. Barnabas tells Joshua he is the Collinsport Strangler. In pity, Joshua shoots his son through the heart.
1795 time period. Joshua realizes the truth about Barnabas and insists he be hidden in the tower room at Collinwood.
Nathan decides to drive Millicent insane, but then he notices that she sees lights in the tower room.
Nathan sends Millicent to the tower room where she discovers Barnabas. He sinks his fangs into her neck.
Bathia Mapes, summoned from the supernatural, attempts to lift the curse from Barnabas.
In the Old House, Bathia's spell is interrupted by a visit from Naomi. Bathia is consumed by flames.
1795 time period. Threatening the jailer with a gun, Peter leads Victoria from her cell, but she is wounded as she escapes.
Daniel is prevented from seeing his sister, and is told she is insane. Escaped convict Victoria Winters returns to the Old House, and has a terrifying dream.
Nathan plots to murder Daniel, and blackmails Noah into helping him. Daniel goes to Victoria for help.
Peter contacts Naomi, who promises to help. Victoria shoots Noah to stop him from strangling Daniel. Peter is arrested.
Vicki hides at Collinwood, and overhears that Peter has been arrested for murder. Nathan challenges Naomi to look in the tower room if she wants to know the truth about Barnabas.
Naomi learns the horrifying and shocking truth about her son Barnabas.
1795 time period. Naomi takes poison and leaves a note for Joshua. She goes to the tower room and collapses.
1795 time period. Barnabas plans his revenge on Nathan, who later sets a trap for Barnabas.
1795 time period. Barnabas and Nathan fight to the death. Joshua orders Ben to seal Barnabas's coffin. Victoria awaits her hanging. Peter vows they will be reunited someday somehow.
In 1968, Barnabas fears that Victoria has learned his secret during her time in 1795.
Victoria buys a portrait of Angélique, much to Barnabas' horror. He sneaks into Collinwood at night and burns the canvas, which magically restores itself to the taunts of Angélique's laughter.
Presented by Richard O'Brien in a deserted underground train station.
A long abandoned house, an urban legend and a secret party; the ingredients are all there in this stylish B-movie horror.
Two monsters come to an unlikely - and uneasy - agreement.
The Cat's Eyed Boy revenges bad guys.
A young scientist arrives to a small fishing town to fight against the creature living under the water.

Nine people find themselves trapped in a warehouse that contains the remains of the old Frightworld Amusement Park - a place haunted by the spirit of Verden Fell, a serial killer who died there a year before.
A documentary filmmaker finds himself drawn into the seedy world of a snuff filmmaker with a mysterious dark side.
A bickering couple's relationship is put to a test when they encounter a spreading zombie epidemic.
Two girls rent a haunted palace, aided by a witchcraft manager. A cop's marriage turns eerie in a remote bungalow, revealing its dark history.
A ghost haunts a group of boys by wreaking havoc after she's met her demise.
As Victoria is hanged in 1795, she is transported back to 1968.
Roger is mesmerized by the portrait. Professor Stokes offers to buy it but Roger tops his offer.
While driving Victoria, Barnabas crashes the car in an attempt to avoid hitting a man at the roadside.
Jeff Clark visits Victoria in the hospital. Dr. Lang tells Julia he knows the truth about Barnabas.
Dr. Lang claims he can cure Barnabas. Roger comes under the spell of the portrait of Angelique.
Victoria goes to the Collins mausoleum to find the secret room proving that she really did visit the past.
Barnabas begins to revert to vampirism. Dr. Lang tells him a cure can be made permanent.
Victoria tells Barnabas she cannot marry him. Dr. Lang promises to help Barnabas change her mind.
Dr. Lang offers to give Barnabas the physical appearance of Jeff to fully free him from the curse.
Roger introduces his new wife, Cassandra, whom he married the day after they first met.

Elizabeth begs Cassandra to leave Roger. A troubled Victoria knows Casandra's true identity. In private, Cassandra confides to the portrait of Barnabas that she intends to ensure that his curse continues.
Barnabas obtains a talisman from Stokes to protect Lang, which successfully disarms Cassandra's magic. Lang reveals the body he intends to house Barnabas' life force in to end the curse.
Dr. Eric Lang tries persuading Barnabas to go through with an experiment that will transfer Barnabas' life-force to an inanimate body.
Angelique reveals to Barnabas that her curse will return as the horrifying climax of a dream curse.
Maggie is the first victim of the dream curse, seeing a skull after being led to a room of doors.
Barnabas realizes that Victoria loves Jeff and tries to dissuade Lang from using Jeff's face in the experiment.
Julia discovers the experiment involves the creation of a living being made from human parts.
Cassandra forces Tony Peterson, now under her power, to steal the talisman from Dr. Lang's office.
Maggie tells her dream to Jeff, who then has the dream, including the vision of a skeleton behind a door.
Barnabas persuades Julia to release Willie from Windcliff Sanitarium. Joe orders Willie to stay away from Maggie.
Dr. Lang has the dream, during which he sees a headless creature laughing at him.
Dr. Lang's experiment begins but Cassandra causes him to become seriously ill.
Dr. Lang struggles to leave a message on his tape recorder before dying. Julia has the dream.
A desperate Julia enlists the aid of Professor Stokes in the hope of ending the horrible series of dreams.
Julia studies Dr. Lang's notes on the experiment. Stokes makes inquiries about the dream curse.
David is rendered speechless when he tries to tell his father of Cassandra's treachery.
Julia nervously conducts the experiment on Barnabas, resulting in the creation of Adam.
Barnabas and Julia find that the man-made creation Adam cannot speak and behaves like a child.
Cassandra allows David to speak so that he can tell about his dream to Mrs. Johnson.
Adam runs away but Barnabas brings him back and chains him in a cell in the Old House basement.
Willie is ordered to stay with Adam. Dr. Lang's message on the tape recorder is heard by Adam.
When Adam escapes, Roger shoots and wounds him, thinking he is threatening the life of David.
Julia gives medical treatment to Adam, who seems to understand Barnabas and can speak his name.
The wearing of Josette's earrings compels Maggie to go to the Old House, where Willie tries to befriend her.
Barnabas hires Sam to age the portrait of Angelique. As he does, Cassandra also begins to age.
Cassandra demands that Sam return the portrait to her, but he refuses and she causes him to go blind.
Taunted by Willie, an angry Adam escapes from his cell in the Old House basement and attacks Barnabas.
Barnabas decides that Adam is too much of a danger and must be killed but Adam kidnaps Carolyn.
Tony and Elizabeth search for Carolyn. Adam hides Carolyn in the cellar and attempts to communicate with her. Willie sees a wolf in his dream.
Julia tries hypnotism on Willie to make him forget his dream. Adam is captured by the police when he leaves to get Carolyn food.
Elizabeth visits Adam in jail. She tells Vicky that she thinks Barnabas knows Adam. Adam escapes from jail.
Adam rescues Carolyn from falling off Widows' Hill. Adam leaps off the cliff as the sheriff and Barnabas watch.
Barnabas and Willie search for Adam. Willie attempts to tell the dream to Carolyn.
With Professor Stokes serving as her beckoner, Carolyn experiences the dream curse.
In an attempt to defeat Angelique, Stokes, Julia and Tony hold a seance to summon Reverend Trask.
Julia gives Davis the tape recorder that Dr. Lang recorded his last words on. The ghost of Trask appears to Barnabas.
Sam teaches Adam to speak. Reverend Trask puts Barnabas on trial for murdering Trask.
Elizabeth sees Cassandra and Tony kiss. When she threatens to tell Roger, Cassandra places a curse on her.
Elizabeth is terrified of being buried alive. Adam suddenly appears and frightens Maggie.
Julia discovers the ghost of Josette weeping and realizes that Trask has taken revenge against Barnabas.
Cassandra causes Elizabeth to lose awareness of her own identity and to believe she is Naomi Collins.
Cassandra visits Sam in the hospital and forces him to begin telling the dream to Victoria.
Sam dies before he can finish telling Victoria the dream. Professor Stokes befriends Adam.
The ghost of Reverend Trask exorcises Cassandra and causes her to disappear.
Again believing she is her ancestor Naomi Collins, Elizabeth takes poison in an attempt to commit suicide.
A mysterious man named Nicholas Blair, claiming to be Cassandra's brother, arrives at Collinwood.
Nicholas takes the portrait of Angelique in the hope it will help him discover her whereabouts.
In a further attempt to locate Cassandra, Nicholas places Tony under an hypnotic trance.
Jeff has a dream about Nathan Forbes. When Joe rouses Jeff from his sleep, he attacks Joe.
Nicholas urges Victoria to lead him to the tree where Cassandra was exorcised.
Nicholas brings Cassandra back to Collinwood and warns her of the consequences of her failure.
Professor Stokes warns Victoria to leave town in an effort to keep her from having the dream.
Victoria goes to the Evans' cottage for safety. Maggie sees Angelique appear near Victoria's bed.
Victoria discovers that Angelique has attempted to trick her into having the dream.
Cassandra raises the ghost of Sam Evans and forces him to tell the dream to Victoria.
Barnabas and Willie take Joe to the hospital. Victoria has the dream.
Maggie learns about Joe's accident and meets Nicholas.
Cassandra, alias Angelique, tricks Barnabas into confronting Victoria, but Julia intervenes.
After Barnabas forces Victoria to tell him the dream, he is attacked by a bat.
Believing Barnabas to be dead, Julia and Willie bury him.
Julia realizes Barnabas is not dead when Adam gestures as though he were buried alive.
Professor Stokes and Julia dig up Barnabas, who revives and realizes he is still human.
Carolyn hides Adam in the closed-off west wing of Collinwood.
Nicholas Blair listens to Lang's tape. When David later plays it for Julia it is blank.
When Carolyn brings breakfast to Adam, he reads lines from a love poem to her.
Nicholas summons the ghost of Dr. Lang, who reveals that Julia brought Adam to life.
Nicholas raises the bodies which provided the parts for Adam and learns where he is hiding.
Nicholas meets Adam and befriends him.
After Cassandra attempts voodoo on Adam, Nicholas takes away her supernatural powers.
Cassandra admits to Barnabas that she is really Angelique. She begins to age rapidly.
Trying to save her life, Angelique desperately begs forgiveness from Barnabas.
Nicholas moves into a house by the sea and brings Angelique's coffin to the basement.
When Adam learns that Carolyn does not love him, he tries to kill himself.
After being influenced by Nicholas, Adam demands that Barnabas create a mate for him.
After searching for Maggie, Barnabas finds her dressed in a 19th century gown, unable to remember her name.
When Sabrina sees Barnabas' wolf's head cane, she begins to remember what happened two years earlier.
Absolutely terrified of the sea, an American lawyer reluctantly goes on an ocean cruise to be near the wife of a client, with no idea of the grim situation that awaits them all.

In an effort to further explore the galaxy, the United States is hours away from launching a manned mission to Venus. But when a Chinese plot to destroy the Earth is uncovered, the U.S. teams up with the Soviet Union to replace me...
The people of a small town have been selling their souls to a crossroad demon.

Joe Melton moves to the country for some peace and quiet, but he discovers the residents of Miranda Falls are being brutally slaughtered. The Devil rises from his prison deep below the earth's surface. Only Joe and his talking axe...

When Mark, Parker, Melissa, and Karen decide to go camping in the small town of Pleasant Point, they find the town has much to offer... including a string of brutal murders. When Melissa is kidnapped by a psychotic doctor who thin...
A young mother and her six-year-old son come face to face with the mysteries of two murders and a great crime against the Chinese community into which they have recently arrived from Shanghai.

It was a day like any other, but for a group of school friends it quickly becomes a desperate fight for survival when heavy rain turns those caught in the downpour into homicidal maniacs. Locked inside the school as violence erupt...
Victoria tells Barnabas she will marry Jeff Clark. Later, she is kidnapped in the woods by Adam.
Victoria begs for her freedom, but Adam tells her she is to be held as a hostage.
Handyman Tom Jennings finds Angelique's coffin and is attacked in the woods.
Nicholas supplies drugs to Adam to render Victoria unconscious.
Nicholas releases Angelique from her coffin as a vampire under his power.
Professor Stokes tries to convince Adam to reveal where he is hiding Victoria.
Julia agrees to create a mate for Adam, who threatens to destroy the Collins family otherwise.
Nicholas encounters Maggie with Joe Haskell and orders Angelique to attack Joe.
Willie is persuaded to help with the experiment. Angelique bites Joe.
In the Old House basement laboratory, Julia makes preparations for the experiment.
Nicholas fears Tom Jennings will reveal the secret of Angelique's coffin.
Angelique sends Joe to Tom's room in the hospital. With Joe's help, she bites Tom.
Barnabas forces Willie to dig up Tom's grave, which they discover is empty.
Barnabas tells Julia that Tom is now a vampire. Tom breaks into the Old House.
Julia informs Barnabas that she cannot continue with the experiment.
Barnabas discovers fang marks on Julia's neck. Jeff breaks into the laboratory.
Roger reports that Elizabeth has escaped from the Windcliff sanitarium.
Elizabeth secretly follows Julia to the tomb containing Tom's coffin.
Barnabas rescues Julia and returns to the crypt to fight the vampire.
After dawn arrives, Barnabas stakes Tom in his coffin.
Before Angelique beckons, Joe begs Maggie to prevent him from leaving his apartment.
Joe apologies to Maggie, but leaves her again when Angelique summons him.
Angelique is determined to become the life force in the second experiment.
Roger offers Jeff a job, but he turns it down. Elizabeth dreams of being buried alive.
After a jealous Adam sees Tony and Carolyn kissing, he attacks Tony.
Roger is shocked to learn of the changes Elizabeth is making in her will.
When Jeff is unable to explain his strange behavior, Victoria returns his engagement ring.
Adam returns to Collinwood and is overwhelmed by Carolyn's gift.
Barnabas decides that Maggie must be used as the experiment's life force.
Willie hides Maggie in the secret room of the Collins Mausoleum.
Barnabas vows to kill Adam, but Adam overpowers him and begins to strangle Victoria.
At the mausoleum, Willie prevents Maggie from escaping.

The strength of the diabolical lies in the power of deception. In subtle ways, it destroys the bonds of friendship and family, distorts the beliefs of the faithful, and takes possession of the living. Sarah Miller perceives that s...

Lain's friends suspect her involvement in a series of computer errors that caused a lethal traffic accident. Meanwhile, her sister is haunted by mysterious messages demanding that she "fulfill the prophecy".

When an image of herself appears in the clouds, the real Lain enters the wired on a search for answers. Her quest leads to a "child-killer" scientist whose devious work is being exploited by the Knights.
The more involved with computers she becomes, the more Lain begins to transform. In the cybernetic cocoon that was once her room, she's hard at work blurring the lines between reality and the wired.
Covert agents in black suits take Lain in for questioning. When the interrogation hits too close to home, Lain flips from real to wired in the blink of an eye.

A man (Micheal) searches for his legacy, a way to be remembered forever. In a time of desperate financial trouble, a mysterious stranger shows up with an answer to Micheal's needs. Desperate and curious, he accepts.
Two years after their loved ones were murdered in obsessive rage, the survivors are dragged into a horrific psychological breakdown - and blood soaked plan for revenge.
Mrs. Johnson goes to the Collinsport Inn to visit Burke Devlin to let him know Laura Collins arrived in town. Laura reveals that she has come back for David, who has a nightmare about his mother.
Carolyn informs Barnabas that she wants to be the life force for Adam's sake.
Julia makes preparations to begin the experiment in the Old House basement.
After something goes wrong with the experiment, Julia fears Carolyn may die.
Carolyn appears to be dead, but later her body is missing from Josette's room.
When Julia tries to hypnotize Maggie, she recognizes Julia's medallion.
Nicholas calls up the spirit of Danielle Roget to be used as the new life force.
Adam brings Leona Eltridge to be used as the life force to create Eve.
Stokes reveals Leona is a reincarnation of the evil Danielle Roget from the 18th century.
After seeing Willie leave the mausoleum secret room, David investigates.
Barnabas fears that Maggie will reveal his long-hidden secret.
Eve tells Nicholas that she hates Adam and wants to kill him.
Nicholas stops Angelique from biting Jeff. Adam brings Eve to Nicholas' basement.
Elizabeth is found in the graveyard and brought home, where she appears to be dead.
After being declared dead, Elizabeth revives. Victoria decides to give Jeff another chance.
Barnabas goes to Nicholas' house with the intention of killing Eve.
Nicholas orders Angelique not to see Barnabas again without his permission.
Joe comes to Angelique, but she rejects him. In a rage, Joe stabs himself.
Barnabas takes Joe's body to Julia, who discovers wounds on Joe's neck.
Eve sees Jeff waiting for Victoria. Later, she calls him by the name of Peter Bradford.
Nicholas sends Eve back to the 18th century to meet Peter when he first lived.
Nicholas proposes to Maggie that they become husband and wife.
Angelique orders Barnabas to force Joe to drink poisoned medicine.
Julia catches Barnabas attempting to poison Joe, who later tries to strangle Barnabas.
Joe is found unconscious in the mausoleum and later confesses he attempted to kill Barnabas.
The sheriff questions Mrs. Johnson, Julia and Barnabas about Joe.
For protection, Barnabas is locked in a cell in the Old House basement.
After Roger dreams about the wedding of Victoria and Jeff, he decides to stop it.
Angelique makes plans to go away with Barnabas, who tries to reach Victoria.
Victoria finds Barnabas in the woods and hides him in the west wing of Collinwood.
Julia discovers that Adam is suffering from the same neck wounds as Barnabas.
Nicholas decides to destroy Angelique but discovers her coffin is empty.
Angelique performs a ceremony to send Eve back to 1795 to find Peter Bradford.
1795 time period. Eve visit Peter just before he is to be hanged for "Gloria" Winters' escape. Joshua frees Ben and gives him the Collins Family history. Ben recognizes Eve and gives her the book.
A group of surfers discover an old board game which claims a life every time it is played.
Buried grudges have disasterous consequences for a class reunion in this unapologetically bloody film from Korean director Dae-wung Lim.
A grieving couple retreat to their cabin in the woods, hoping to repair their broken hearts and troubled marriage, but nature takes its course and things go from bad to worse.
Country: Denmark, Germany, France, Sweden, Italy, Poland

PlotKeywords: A bizarre medical exam of a nude woman by several doctors and scientists reveal that their latest subject has committed suicide before giving birth to one of the mutant creatures they had placed within her body. So, an investigati...

primaryTitle: Old McDonald or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Being a Scarecrow
PlotKeywords: A hapless traveler picks up a hiker and both get trapped on a farmer's land, where they quickly are running for their lives to escape the farmer's demise. The Farmer uses humans as live scarecrows.
The hottest sorority on campus is actually a cult of devil worshipers.

When Frank and Julie move to a small isolated town with their son Sam, both Julie and Sam become ill. Driven by terrifying nightmares of torture that come true Frank begs a local midwife Helen to care for Sam as he desperately sea...
A group of boys think that taking their girlfriends to a haunted house is all in good fun, but it turns out that the urban legend about the place is very real.
Jeff digs up Peter's coffin and finds it is empty. He discovers Eve's body in his closet.
Victoria tries to convince Jeff to call the police instead of running away. Angelique plots against Nicholas.
Angelique visits the Netherworld and tells Diabolos that Nicholas is in love with Maggie.
Diabolos orders Nicholas to sacrifice Maggie in a black mass so they may be together.
Nicholas revives Tom Jennings and orders him to attack Victoria.
Barnabas battles Tom at daybreak and confronts him by forming a cross using metal candlesticks.
Amy Jennings is glad when her brother Chris decides to stay in Collinsport.
Barnabas tries to prevent the new experiment to bring Eve back to life.
Adam seeks revenge against Barnabas for failing to give him a mate by kidnapping Victoria and threatening to electrocute her with the same equipment that destroyed Eve's body.
After they are married, Victoria watches in horror as Jeff fades away.
When a grisly car accident put his wife into a coma, a man reluctantly pulls the plug only to realize her spirit has turned vengeful against the living.

It's the tenth anniversary of the Interstellar Alliance, and President Sheridan is on his way to Babylon 5 for the celebration. However, he must first deal with a threat from the future, while Lochley handles a case of demonic pos...
Josh finds it difficult to tell his friend Parker about his horrible b.o. In the meantime, Parker thinks Josh's lack of "friendship" is the result of not enough buddy time. In the second ...

Brilliant young Victor Karlstein finds himself lost in an abyss of personal turmoil and professional stress after the woman he most likely seemed to love dies while under the care of his own mysterious medical facility. Determined...
Three young ad-men enter the woods for a photo shoot, but a girlfriend's mysterious disappearance sparks a harrowing descent into unreality.

A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the nordic winter wilderness. What began as a training mission rapidly evolves into a battle against the most unlikely enemies one could think of.
100 Years of Horror looks at portrayals of aliens in horror films from the 1950s to the early 1980s.
100 Years of Horror looks at the Frankenstein franchise after 1950 and focuses on different interpretations of the Baron and his creation.
100 Years of Horror looks at vampires and other blood-sucking creatures.
100 Years of Horror looks at films focusing on the devil and demons.
A look at dinosaur movies including "The Lost World", "The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms", and "Godzilla".
100 Years of Horror looks at female antagonists in horror films.
100 Years of Horror examines the myriad of gimmicks used to enhance terror in horror films including Technicolor, 3-D, insurance, and electrical shocks.
100 Years of Horror examines movies featuring man-made monsters like the Fly and the Golem.
A look at horror films based on mutants, such as the Creature from the Black Lagoon and the Abominable Snowman.
100 Years of Horror examines the history of the werewolf film focusing on the work of Long Chaney, Jr. and Michael Landon.

Under pressure from their bloodthirsty boss, several working-class women, employed by manufacturer Mr. Duralac in a remote French countryside factory, are subject to vampirization while accomplishing their night shift.

City Horror is a four-part series of horror movies that were each featured as one-hour television movies in 2002. The four movies include Scream, Stage of the Evil Spirit, The Song of the Dead and the Evil Spirit. Each program is ...
With a last minute cancellation, Elliot Renfield counts himself as quite fortunate that he has found accommodations in the last vacant room in the hotel. That is, until a man comes calling,...
Two guys wake up in a bathroom - chained! The only way for them to survive is to solve the gay killer's morbid puzzles and make an awful sacrifice.
A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.
A group of utility workers are trapped in a series of tunnels which, unfortunately, contain a scientist mutated by his own creation. The creature feeds instantly on a rat, becoming what it has eaten.
An ancient European Legend comes alive with the story of La Befana-a mythical character who rewards the good children...and punishes the bad. The children of the village dismiss the legend ...

While searching for a "cure all" serum, Dr. Kanopolus is being pressured for results by the pharmaceutical company funding the project. With time running out, his desperation decisions will unleash a terrifying monster on a killin...
A man who has descended into madness recounts his abduction at the hands of a humanoid alien.
Professor Stokes tells Victoria that she can be with Jeff only if she dies.
During a seance to contact Jeff, the spirit of Magda speaks through Carolyn.
Amy tells David that Quentin is angry. Spirits visit them as they enter the west wing.
Roger discovers David and Amy are missing. David hears Quentin's music and searches for him.
David and Amy find what they believe to be the skeleton of Quentin.
The ghosts of Quentin and Beth Chavez silently appear to David and Amy.
Professor Stokes brings Janet Findley, a medium, to find the spirit possessing Collinwood.
David and Amy lock Ms. Findley in the secret passageway at Collinwood.
Madame Findley is trapped by unseen forces in a hidden room where an old, disconnected telephone keeps ringing, but no one is there.
After Jeff returns, he and Victoria disappear together into the past.
Following a visit from Joe, Chris transforms into a werewolf.
Maggie is hired as the new governess. Joe is attacked by the werewolf.
Barnabas decides that David and Amy should go on a trip to Boston with him and Maggie.
Mrs. Johnson believes Victoria wants to return from the past. A message convinces Barnabas to stay at Collinwood.
Joe is tormented by visions of Tom as a vampire and Chris as a werewolf.
Barnabas makes plans to travel back in time to prevent Victoria from being hanged.
1796 time period. We see the events just before Victoria is to be hanged as a witch then Barnabas returns to 1796 to try to save her.
1796 time period. In 1796 Barnabas meets Ben, Nathan and Victoria. He promises her that he has a plan to save her and Peter.
1796 time period. In 1796 Barnabas spares the life of Nathan Forbes in exchange for a confession. He then visits the docks for a snack.

1796 time period. Barnabas is shocked to find Crystal's body at Collinwood and is even more shocked to see Angelique. Angelique agrees to save Victoria for a price. Victoria hangs for the second time.
1796 time period. Angelique's spell saves Victoria but she vows never to release her hold over Barnabas. Later we see the final fates of Natalie and Nathan.
1796 time period. Ben surprises Natalie and Nathan and locks Barnabas in his coffin.In 1966 Julia and Willie see the ghost of Josette.
In 1969, Willie releases Barnabas from his chained coffin.
Carolyn convinces Chris Jennings to move into Matthew Morgan's old cottage.
David locks Mrs. Johnson inside the cottage.
Amy asks why Quentin and David's plot against Carolyn involves her brother. Chris plans to go away before he turns into a werewolf.
As Elizabeth lies paralyzed in her coffin, Carolyn hears her mother's voice warning her.
While walking through the woods, Carolyn is attacked by the werewolf.
The sheriff takes Chris into custody and Barnabas attempts to provide an alibi.
Chris tells Barnabas of the night when he first changed into a werewolf.
After Maggie punishes David, he threatens to get even. In the west wing, Maggie sees Quentin.
Barnabas contacts elderly jeweler Ezra Braithwaite to learn about the pentagram found in the child's coffin.
Quentin's ghost appears to Ezra, who realizes he is the same Quentin he knew at Collinwood as a young man.
Roger returns from a trip and learns that Barnabas has accused David of stealing Ezra's record book.

PlotKeywords: A behind-the-scenes preview at the upcoming horror remake, Black Christmas, to be released on Christmas Day 2006. Featuring interviews with writer/director, Glen Morgan, his cast of sorority girls and key crew members, discover th...
Mike and Vicki race against time to save Henry.

In 1840 Dante's Cove, an island resort in the Caribbean, Grace is a powerful witch who catches her fiancée Ambrosius Vallin cheating on her with a man, upon which she imprisons him in the basement of their house, cursing him to sp...

Having been freed from his imprisoned cell, the evil sorcerer Ambrosius Vallin retains corporeal existence from Kevin's blood and sets up a lair underneath the Dante's Cove lighthouse where he continues to use his powers to call u...
When the night falls, and the creatures of the dark are crawling out of the shadows, there is only one man who stands between us and evil: Edward Carnby.
Angelique's body is discovered perfectly preserved in her coffin.
Hannah discovers the secret about her niece Angelique. David and Amy find Barnabas' portrait.
Angelique, determined to banish the ghost of Dameon, begins a special ceremony.
Angelique suddently feels icy cold and realizes she needs a victim for warmth to survive.
Angelique and Hoffman trick Maggie into wearing Angelique's dress to a costume party.
Barnabas makes an attempt to discover if Alexis is really Angelique.
Yaeger rents a run-down farmhouse. As Cyrus, he asks Maggie to meet him on Widows' Hill.
Yaeger and Angelique agree on a plan. He kidnaps Maggie, hiding her at the farmhouse.
Dr. Julia Hoffman arrives in parallel time and impersonates her counterpart, the housekeeper Hoffman.
Angelique tries to make Quentin believe that Maggie is a witch.
Daniel devises a plan to scare Maggie, who hears humming when Daniel speaks to Angelique's portrait.
Alexis Stokes, Angelique's identical twin sister, arrives. Maggie and Quentin have an argument.
Alexis inquires about the seance at which Angelique died. Cyrus drinks a potion and collapses.
Cyrus cannot recall what happened last night, but somebody attacked Sabrina. Sabrina goes to Collinwood to recreate a seance.
Cyrus learns about damage caused by John Yaeger. Daniel insists Alexis is really his mother.
Hannah Stokes promises to help Bruno. Her tarot cards reveal a startling revelation about Angelique.
Cyrus refuses to tell Horace Gladstone the purpose of his experiment.
Bruno panics when Quentin reports he saw the ghost of Dameon Edwards.
Eva searches for the reason behind her sisters murder but finds that evil is already pursuing her.
When a battleship deployed to the Persian Gulf for black-op interrogations falls silent, a Marine task force is sent to investigate, only to find everyone aboard slaughtered.
When her car breaks down in a small town, Liz Chambers (Jaimie Alexander) meets journalist Sarah Austin (Hudson Leick), who tells her about the town's bloodthirsty past. A hundred years ago...
Carolyn goes to the tower room where she encounters Angelique's murderer.
Barnabas discloses that he and Roxanne can never be together.
In the year 1995, the estate of Collinwood lies abandoned in ruins.
In 1995, an aged Carolyn babbles hysterically. Professor Stokes suggests Barnabas and Julia depart.
The sheriff urges Barnabas and Julia to leave town. A falling bust nearly kills Julia.
Stokes reveals that both Carolyn and Quentin are insane. Barnabas and Julia see what they take to be David Collins' ghost.
Quentin is terrified by ghosts when he visits Collinwood. Julia follows Carrie Stokes' ghost to the playroom.
Barnabas discovers a note containing six clues. He sees the ghost of Gerard.
Barnabas confronts Gerard's ghost. The ghost of Hallie attempts to help Barnabas and Julia.
In 1970, Barnabas and Julia learn that the playroom at Collinwood does not seem to exist.
David dreams of a carousel music box. A dress from his dream appears in Hallie's room.
Barnabas and Julia learn that the children from 1840 died at the same age as the present children.
Julia senses the presence of Gerard. Daphne leads Quentin to her grave.
Quentin attempts to exorcise Collinwood. David and Hallie hold a seance.
Hallie finds David possessed by Tad. Barnabas visits Sebastian and finds Roxanne Drew.
David is afraid that he and Hallie will become Tad and Carrie from 1840.
David and Hallie burn the dolls from a dollhouse, but later find them still in the dollhouse.
Julia discovers a drawing of the 1840's Quentin's stairway through time.
Sebastian sees a vision and warns against going to Daphne's room.
Roxanne learns Sebastian had a date with Maggie. Julia discovers fang marks on Maggie's neck.
The dolls disappear from the dollhouse and David and Hallie see themselves in place of the dolls.
Carolyn comes under the spell of Gerard and becomes Leticia Faye.
The children put a doll representing Barnabas in the dollhouse, but it is destroyed.
Gerard and Daphne lead David and Hallie to Rose Cottage, where they become possessed.
Daphne, determined to prevent the return of Gerard, sends the children away.
At Windcliff, Quentin distracts Julia while David and Daphne perform a ceremony.
Julia hypnotizes David and learns that Rose Cottage will be destroyed that night.
Daphne refuses to leave until the children are found. Quentin digs his own grave.
When Joshua Licet wakes up with his wife missing he must decide whether to lock himself in his house for forty days and 40 nights of torture or to leave her to die.

A handful of people wind up stranded in a desolate snowy mountain area in the wake of an airplane crash. They seek refuge in an old abandoned cabin. The group find themselves being terrorized by a lethal predatory extraterrestrial...

The story of six people caught in the unusual (except in horror films) predicament of being stranded in a deserted fishing lodge with a host of alien-infected, mutant amoeba-controlled zombies at their doorstep.
An old film reel holds deadly secrets.
Flowers On The Razorwire is a bone chilling new horror anthology created by underground horror legend Hart D. Fisher (The Garbage Man) that drags you by the throat into a world one part ...

A film edited from the home movies of serial killers Wayne and Andrea Montgomery, which presents a look into their quiet, suburban lives...and the graphic, disturbing details of their horrific crimes.

primaryTitle: Once Upon a Midnight Dreary II
PlotKeywords: Five short stories involving an Alien invasion where angry Aliens are on the loose, a visit from a hellish demon who appears from a man's closet...
Catherine tells her sister Daphne about the bizarre lottery held by the Collins family.
Bramwell interrupts the wedding of Morgan and Catherine at Collinwood.
Morgan challenges Bramwell and they prepare to fight a duel.
After Bramwell and Morgan duel, Daphne tends to Bramwell's wounds.
At a seance, Melanie declares that the lottery must be held or everyone will die of the plague.
Morgan insists that he and Catherine must never have children.
Flora makes lottery preparations and ensures that the women must participate.
Quentin locks a disturbed Gabriel in the tower room.
Gabriel enters the locked lottery room, prepared to stay the night.
A delirious Melanie cries out to the spirits of Brutus Collins and James Forsythe.
The ghost of Justin Collins announces that the lottery must be held again.
In a trance, Carrie Stokes sees James Forsythe, who cursed the Collins family.
Catherine is shocked when Daphne reveals that she and Bramwell are to be married.
Josette Collins speaks of her own love for Bramwell, then visits Catherine.

(Lost Episode: The video for episode 1219 is lost. A recreation is featured on this collection, utilizing the original audio along with still images from other episodes.) Catherine informs Bramwell that she is pregnant with his ch...
Catherine orders Bramwell to keep her secret. The lottery is again held.
Morgan has the lock changed on the room where the lottery winner must stay.
Melanie reveals to Kendrick that she was adopted into the Collins family.
Melanie questions Julia Collins about her parentage. Julia realizes Morgan is possessed.
Morgan asks Carrie for help and encounters the ghost of Brutus Collins.
Kendrick questions Julia about the discrepancies in the story of Melanie's adoption.
Gabriel gives Melanie a letter for Flora, whom he later attempts to attack.
Melanie Collins urges Flora Collins to tell Kendrick Young the truth about his sister Stella's death.
Dahne Harridge Collins spies her husband Bramwell passionately embracing his sister Catherine.
After a seance, Morgan informs Julia that he will reveal the truth about what happened in 1680.
Morgan relates how Brutus Collins tormented and set a curse upon the Collins family.
Bramwell, though learning his ship has arrived and that he is now wealthy, is distraught over Daphne.
In a trance, Carrie Stokes discloses that Melanie's mother is alive and lives nearby.
Julia tries to persuade Carrie to not tell the truth to Melanie. Gabriel Collins escapes.
The bodies of James Forsythe and Amanda Collins from 1680 are discovered.
Morgan and Gabriel engage in a bitter fight. Kendrick prepares to make a revelation to Melanie.
Josette informs Melanie about her true parentage. Bramwell watches over the ill Daphne.
The ghost of Brutus Collins demands another lottery be held and Melanie becomes insane.
Flora declares that the lottery must happen immediately and Kendrick insists on taking part.
Morgan overhears Bramwell speak to Catherine about a very private secret they are sharing.
Morgan decides to also take revenge on Catherine for her unfaithfulness.
Bramwell and Catherine fight the ghost of Brutus inside the locked room.
The Collinses struggle to finally free themselves from the long-standing family curse.
In 1840, Julia overhears Ben Stokes reveal he told Daniel Collins that Quentin is dead.
In the mausoleum secret room, Julia sees the chained coffin of Barnabas.
Gabriel Collins orders Gerard to supply him with arsenic. Barnabas tells Roxanne of his plans.
Gerard describes how Quentin and Tad Collins died in a storm at sea.
Daphne asks Barnabas about Quentin, then secretly leaves a note for him.
Desmond learns Daphne has taken a job at the newspaper office.
Otis Greene realizes Desmond is under the power of the head.
Julia reports to Barnabas what she learned about the trial of Judah Zachery.
Leticia Faye and Julia attempt to revive Judah. Quentin receives a note from Joanna Mills.
Angelique, using the alias Valerie, causes Roxanne to collapse in front of Trask.
Julia sets up a laboratory in the vault, planning to transfer the life force to the body of Judah.
Julia uses the mask and an electrical storm in an attempt to bring Judah back to life.
Barnabas believes Roxanne will rise as a vampire. Gerard calls Valerie by the name Miranda.
In a dream, Gerard sees a visitor with the head. Awake, he receives the head from Charles Dawson.
Quentin realizes that Lamar Trask and Samantha Collins are trying to turn Daniel Collins against him.
Quentin is anxious to learn who is leaving notes for him, supposedly from Joanna Mills.
In the Old House basement, Trask hears noises coming from inside the wall.
Gerard Stiles causes Daphne to dream that she loves him instead of Quentin.
Mordecai Grimes accuses Quentin of killing his cattle by using witchcraft.
Trask causes Gabriel to tell information that leads to Quentin's arrest for murder.
After a vision in a seance, Daniel announces he believes Quentin is guilty.
Gabriel learns that Daniel intends to change his will again.
Gerard puts Edith Collins under his power. Desmond is shocked to read Daniel's will.
The revised terms of Daniel's will are revealed. Mildred Ward dies in Quentin's presence.
Trask attempts to convince Judge Wiley to charge Quentin with practicing witchcraft.
Carrie Stokes meets Jeremy Grimes and they are attracted to each other immediately.
After Daphne finds a note from Joanna, she screams as someone approaches her.
Samantha testifies as Quentin's trial begins with Charles Dawson serving as prosecutor.
Daphne awakes from a dream to find her wedding gown in the dream bridal chamber.
Trask and Gerard find the journal of Collins family servant Ben Stokes.
During the daytime, Gerard goes to the Old House to kill Barnabas.
Julia discovers what Angelique has done for Barnabas. The ghost of Daniel appears.
Daphne is fearful of Joanna. At night, a figure raises a knife in Daphne's room.
Angelique pleads with Gerard. Julia hears footsteps coming from the stairway through time.
Professor Stokes arrives from the year 1970 and is introduced to the Collins family by Julia.
Dawson presents the letter Quentin wrote to Joanna, then displays her death certificate.
Samantha tells Gerard that she knows Joanna is dead, claiming to have killed her.
Daphne awakes from a dream about Gerard, who then asks her to marry him.
In jail, Daphne tells Quentin they must not meet again.
Gerard plans to further incriminate Quentin. He causes Mordecai to collapse.
Judge Vail announces that the court has reached a verdict.
The judge pronounces the verdict in Quentin Collin's witchcraft trial.
In the Parallel Time room, Julia Collins disapproves of Morgan Collins asking Catherine Harridge to marry.
Daphne Harridge suggests to Gabriel Collins that he escape through Parallel Time.
Quentin and Desmond Collins attempt to escape from the Collinsport jail.
Joanna Mills searches for her missing sister Daphne and is discovered by Gabriel.
The ghost of Daniel Collins appears to his terrified son Gabriel.
Joanna shows Samantha Collins a vision of what she will become.
Gerard Stiles spies on Quentin and Daphne as they promise to marry.
Under a spell, Daphne agrees to marry Gerard and a ceremony is performed.
Barnabas Collins pleads with Angelique, masquerading as Valerie, to save Quentin.
Gerard takes away the powers he, as Judah Zachery, bestowed upon Angelique when she was Miranda duVal.
Angelique arrives with the head of Judah Zachery. Later, she is attacked by Lamar Trask.
After making a declaration to Angelique, Barnabas takes revenge on Trask.
In 1841 Parallel Time, Catherine Harridge informs Bramwell Collins that she loves Morgan Collins.
Morgan reminds Gabriel Collins how the lottery can lead to the family curse being broken.
Catherine causes the lottery to be postponed. She is abducted by Bramwell.
Catherine admits her feelings to Bramwell. Kendrick Young investigates the death of his sister.
Eight young adults are sent to do community service at Grizzly Park. There, they are hunted by an escaped serial killer along with the animals of the forest.
Vicki runs up against a Celtic spell when she investigates why a judge, prosecutor and defense attorney are being targeted.

Vicki's investigation into the disappearance of a homeless woman brings her up against a creature that may be more powerful than Henry. Elsewhere, Mike is approached by a mysterious stranger who knows more about Henry.
Vicki is on the trail of a body that has apparently been resurrected.
Norman is back from his demon dimension, and things are not looking good for Vicki.

Follows the final 2 minutes of the eponymous Johnson as he realises that he is the power supply for a bomb ready to go off.
The year: 2241. The transport vessel PANDORA hurtles through space, bringing an alien energy source known as "Thanatos" to fuel-starved planet Earth.
Successful businessman Richard Clarke is bitten by a vampire and is plunged into the dark world of the supernatural.
An action-thriller that follows the events that occur after a man calls the police to let them know of the mysterious presence in his house.
A young man finds himself held captive by a mysterious doctor and his brutish henchman.

Over a long holiday weekend, unable to escape the confines of their sorority house, a handful of unsuspecting girls are left behind to enjoy the quiet sanctuary. The normal house staff has taken off for the weekend, leaving the gi...

A broken-down healer, learns the Magus has abandoned the Wizard's Code and is using his power for evil. Forced to come out of reclusion, this improbable hero finds an improbable assistant -- his teenage niece.
Something ancient lurks in the surf off Sea Bright Beach. It swims silently, can breathe air and walks upright. It's also very, very hungry and not for seafood anymore. Tonya, Rodney and ...
A desperate criminal and a merciless posse become trapped in a remote Mexican ghost town by a vengeful demon.
Harry Johnson informs Nicholas of Eve's plan. Nicholas sends for Angelique.
Jenny stabs Quentin and leaves him to die. Barnabas later finds Dirk leaning over the body.
One day, a horrible thing happened. A mother named Mio killed her son named Kyosuke Date by stabbing him the heart. Is this the end for him? Or is it the start of a new adventure?

Shiro reveals to Kyosuke that his older sister, Yui, is the actual leader of the Kirahara group. Shiro says that his power-mad elder sister wants the Flickers so that she could finally find Runa. Also Shiro tells Kyosuke that he c...

As Kyosuke and Kimugi travel the moon to finally learn the whole truth, flickers are waiting for them to annihilate Kyosuke. After easily defeating them, he goes to the center of Colony Eight and finds a floating brain who turns o...

On the riverside, Shiro, Komugi, and Kyosuke perform a riverside ritual were they put candles on boats in memory of their deceased loved ones. A mysterious woman appears that says that she is Kyosuke's birth mother, Tsubaki Tokisa...
Back cover copy: A jealous wife, an unfaithful husband, a murder, and a one way ticket to the depths of Hell...
Elvira hosts a show about creepy creatures in the world.
An angel causes people to cheerfully go out to murder, and when the Winchesters investigate one of them falls under its sway.
A seductress falls in love with a prince and tries to steal him from his fiancee.
A horror-thriller centered on a woman (Wilson) suffering from a medical condition that causes her to sleep her life away, waking briefly on rare occasions.
A group of people in a post-apocalyptic world fight to survive against a band of vicious cannibals.

Four "actors" go to a cabin in the woods for the weekend to write a movie script. They talk about a relationship movie or a paper bag over the head movie. It starts with an anonymous baghead and slowly escalates.
Good Vampires battle Zombie Vampires while trying to hide their own identity and prevent the infection from spreading.

Based on true facts, a gang of suburban kids is sport-killing home-less people just for fun in the streets of Chicago. One day, they decide to try a new excitement, by murdering a young Mexican working girl, assuming there would b...

A tabloid news crew ventures into the backwoods of Central Florida to investigate reports of an aggressive feral hog who the locals call Hogzilla. What they find, though, are demons, devils, creeping things and pure evil.
An animated short in which a man becomes aggravated with a fly only to be shown what it is like when the tables are turned.
A vicious Ogre rules over a town that has been stuck in time since the 1800s.

Kamei mixes humour, drama and, in this occasion, bits of horror to visualize the physical transformation in yôkai that the three main actresses undergo. Mihiro Iwasaki (Anri Ban) is a model extremely preoccupied by how others look...

A beautiful brunette who loves to watch horror movies late into the night wakes to her own nightmare - she grabbed by a villain where a skull mask and stripped, bound and gagged. Several other bondage vignettes follow.
A man found guilty of a crime against a minor is released from prison and returns to get revenge on the jury who sent him there.

Gradually people notice the heat index is rising, and that all life on Earth is at risk, for a hoard of alien dinosaurs want to take over; until a soldier and a ex-model step in to take back planet Earth.
On the night of the big High-School Prom, the dead rise to eat the living, and the only people who can stop them are the losers who couldn't get dates to the dance.
The Baldini Apple is known as the sweetest, juiciest apple in the world. Where they are grown is a secret, what makes them so exceptional...is also secret....until now.
Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.
A surf-skate action-thriller about five best friends who set out on a road trip that quickly turns into an epic battle for survival.

When old friends from school start dying one by one, Sayree and Nataya begin to search for the secret of the letter that each of their friends received before death. Soon the two believe they are the next targets.
A poor woman is mugged, losses her fiancee and gets taken advantage of before turned into a sex slave. Her spirit delivers whats coming to them, all the way back to the original muggers.

In the smallest of Florida towns a lone well driller, Joe, works gathering geological samples for a university study. Unknowingly, Joe unearths more than just primordial muck from deep below the swamp. A strange oozing liquid, is ...

primaryTitle: Mysterious World, Episode 1: Love Never Dies
PlotKeywords: After suffering her third miscarriage, a young woman desperately struggles to sustain her health as well as her marriage...
Uncovers the shocking truth, history and haunting of Ghost Children, Poltergeist Kids, Haunted Orphanages and Crybaby Bridges through untold stories of unmarked graves.

Keiichi hears the odd circumstances surrounding Satoko's older brother, Satoshi. It seems he simply left the village, but when Keiichi mentions Satoshi to Shion and Rena, each reacts in an unusual manner.

Keiichi learns his classmates knew of his secret meeting with Oishi and discovers disturbing information about Rena's past. As his paranoia escalates, it becomes clear that someone is trying to kill him!
Keiichi adapts to rural life in Hinamizawa by befriending cute classmates Rena, Mion, Satoko, and Rika - but he's appalled to learn of a gruesome murder in the village's past.
Time rewinds to episode five but from Shion's point of view, offering a look into the intricacies of the Sonozaki family.
The grandson of an official on the Hinamizawa dam project is abducted, and Akasaka arrives to investigate. Rika offers him a warning: leave the village immediately or soon face regret.
Unnerved by Rena and Mion's menacing behavior, Keiichi begins to distance himself from his former friends - but it might be too late. On the way home from school, Keiichi is attacked!

The police ask Keiichi to be an informant after an acquaintance of his is found dead. When Keiichi accuses Rena of withholding information, she cryptically tells him that everyone has secrets to hide.
When Shion is discovered to be living as Mion, she is taken to her family estate. After confessing a family insulting secret, Shion is forced to torture herself.
Rika has a rather disturbing conversation with Akasaka, which he relates to Oishi a few years later.
Satoko's violent uncle Teppei is back in town, and she's been missing class. Keiichi witnesses the physical abuse inflicted upon Satoko - and her damaged psyche may have reached the breaking point.

In the aftermath of Satoko's traumatic breakdown, Keiichi decides extreme measures are needed to save her from the abuse of her uncle. On the night of the town festival, he lures Teppei out of his house.
After Rena and Keiichi confront Mion about Rika and Satoko, chilling revelations shed light on the dark origins of Hinamizawa - origins that include cursed blood lines and demonic possessions.
Shion learns that Satoshi has disappeared and looks deeper into the murders that span the last four years.
Has everything been an illusion? When Keiichi heads to Teppei's house and finds Satoko in need of medical help, he becomes convinced: the curse of Oyashiro-sama is causing these misfortunes.
Shion is convinced that her own family is responsible in some way for the numerous disappearances plaguing the village. With that in mind, she takes action.
After strange encounters with Takano, Dr. Irie, and Inspector Oishi, Keiichi is tormented and questioning whether a particular incident actually occurred. Is he losing his grip on reality?
Keiichi meets a pretty waitress who introduces herself as Shion - the younger twin sister of Mion. He's definitely skeptical and believes it's a trick, but Keiichi plays along.
After sneaking into a sacred shrine with Keiichi and Shion, Tomitake and Takano are reported dead. Could it be that Keiichi and Shion will be the next victims of Oyashiro-sama's curse?
Torturing the village leader for information regarding Satoshi only leads Shion to confronting Rika about the murders.
Keiichi indirectly confesses to Rika about sneaking into the forbidden shrine, and his admission may have put Rika and Satako's lives in danger. Soon after, the girls go missing.

Three accomplished centenarians: Frederia Sagor, 102, who started out writing silent films and made the transition to talkies; Ben Levinson, 104, a gold medalist at the Senior Olympics who refuses to slow down; and Clifford Hollid...

101-year-old pacifist Robert St. John has spent most of his life-more than 80 years- witnessing the worst of humankind as a journalist, mostly as a war correspondent. St. John shares his amazing journey of a peaceful warrior.

primaryTitle: A Teacher and Student for Life
PlotKeywords: Dr. Ray H. Crist, once a director with the Manhattan Project and friend of Albert Einstein, is a passionate and learned centenarian who never retired.

Features 107-year-old Rose Freedman telling personal stories with the wisdom that only a centenarian can. Hosted by Jack Lemmon.
Ji-Yeon, a tollgate ticket girl, is frightened by a mysterious black car, which hands over a bloodstained ticket as a fee at midnight.

ROOMMATES is the third part of a 4 horror movie series, FOUR HORROR TALES. Roommates Yoo-jin, Eun-soo, Bo-ram, and Da-young are cramming for a college entrance exam. It's difficult for them to adapt to the stifling atmosphere of t...

Woo-Jin, Jun-A and some friends are on a trip to the mountains. They walk into a dark forest, which is restricted to the public. They soon find themselves in trouble, and find they can't get any reception on their cell phones. The...
A woman investigates a series of bizarre deaths in her new apartment building.
A hero fireman, who is actually a compulsive arsonist, forges an unholy alliance with a mysterious homeless man with more than a passing interest in blazes.

A lonely care-giver to the elderly falls for a man whom she believes is kept in his house by his domineering mother. But as their secret relationship grows, she is horrified to learn that the young man is not what he seems.
A frenzied man finds himself trapped in a nightmarish hospital room. Surrounded by the dead from his past, it appears he's lost in a limbo world between life and death. We discover this is ...
A social worker pursuing a mentally unbalanced man who escaped from a halfway house discovers that her client is prodded to murderous actions by a malevolent demon.
A young woman is stalked by the ghost of an obsessive suitor. After she's found murdered, the cop who failed to protect her is haunted by her cries for help from beyond the grave.

primaryTitle: Jackanory: The Curse of Karrit Poor
PlotKeywords: Dr. Edmund Chinnery narrates the story of how he and his descendants were cursed to have any animal they touch "meet a dreadful end".

primaryTitle: The League of Gentlemen Are Behind You
PlotKeywords: The League of Gentlemen bring their dark but brilliant humour to the stage in this "alternative" pantomime... they're behind you!

When a 'bog body' a 2000 year old murder victim preserved in a peat bog is disturbed by developers in rural Ireland, an archaeologist, a hunter and their helpers face the task of sending him back where he came from.
A psychologist relives her abusive childhood through an encounter with a patient. In order to deal with her trauma, she must end the cycle of abuse once and for all or remain a prisoner of her past.

In an excavation in Saudi Arabia, professor Albert Wombot discovers an ancient object of mysterious origins, and hidden within is a powerful secret. After his discovery the professor is brutally murdered and the secret of his myst...

Soon after finding shelter in the mysterious, fog engulfed town of Mercy, two friends plan to rest up for their next day's journey only to realize, as nights turn to nights, that time is not only on their side - time doesn't exist.

Inspector Black is investigating a series of murders for which there are no apparent leads. The pressure from his supervisor is growing when yet another corpse is found. Meanwhile rock star Max and his manager Tom Meyer are on the...
Elena, twenty years old, gets home at night after fighting with her boyfriend. Somebody, something follows her back home and inside each room. There is a broken pendulum-clock near the ...
An ancient camera steals people's souls and sparks a race against time.

PlotKeywords: A look behind the scenes at Cortlandt Hull's "The Witch's Dungeon," a movie-themed Halloween attraction in Bristol, Connecticut -- now the longest-running show of its type in the United States.
An all new monster with a classic twist. Acclaimed comic book artist and filmmaker, William B. Hughes takes you on a bizarre ODYSSEY of HORROR set in the FORBIDDEN world of young artists, ...

A prominent paranormal journalist Kobayashi goes missing shortly after completing a documentary. What begins as an investigation into strange noises soon evolves into the chilling mystery of a demonic entity named Kagutaba.
Mina inherits a large derelict house and moves in. As she struggles to overcome the pain of a recent relationship break up, she suspects she is not alone in her new house.

The story based off of the controversial manga by Suehiro Maruo takes place where a little orphaned girl joins a freak-show circus troupe whose members rape and abuse her. She then finds a glimmer of hope in the enigmatic magician...

A psychologist reluctantly takes on a child patient whose parents died when the three of them were in a car accident. The girl has become somewhat disassociated, and the question becomes whether she's just "off" or if she's actual...
A young woman must find the murderer of her twin sister, following clues that her dead sister leaves from beyond the grave.
Danny used to be a lawyer before his wife and child were brutally murdered. Now he lives his life by 'cleansing' others.

A man kills an antique dealer during an attempted robbery. A shadowy figure, who seems to know everything about the man and his problems, suddenly appears. Based on a short story by Robert Louis Stevenson.

An intimate drama taking place in a small house lost in the forest, inhabited by two people: a woman suffering from anxiety neurosis and persecution mania and a powerless husband against her terrible illness.
Through a series of horrific murders, the occult, biblical prophecy and sex clash in a melee of gore and mystery, with psychiatrists, attorneys, homicide detectives and rock stars all being suspects.
At the end of their college school year five girls decide not to go home but instead rent a house in town and thus the high-jinks then ensue.
When Josh blames an oil spill on Parker, he feels as guilty as could be. Josh gives Parker a crash course in girl talking for a double date with them and the Ashleys.
A heartwarming tale of a young man who is coping with the reality that his girlfriend has become a hideous possessed-zombie. Armed with a healthy fear of commitment and a silver cross, the ...
